serviceArea: Southeast Florida - Miami-Dade, Broward, Palm Beach Counties
shortDescription: Expert real estate appraisals & consulting with 52+ years experience. MAI & SRA certified. Reserve studies, insurance valuations, FEMA consulting.
longDescription: Millman & Associates, Inc., led by Harris Millman with over 52 years of real estate expertise since 1972, is a full-service appraisal and consulting firm serving Miami-Dade, Broward, and Palm Beach Counties. Harris holds prestigious MAI and SRA designations from the Appraisal Institute and is a Florida State-Certified General Real Estate Appraiser (RZ1730). Services include comprehensive property appraisals (commercial, residential, industrial), expert witness testimony for legal proceedings and insurance claims, reserve studies for condominium and homeowner associations, insurance appraisals for replacement cost valuations, SIRS/Milestone structural integrity reports, and FEMA 50% Rule appraisal and consulting for flood-zone properties. The firm coordinates with third-party engineering services for structural assessments and ensures regulatory compliance.
imagesNote: Professional headshot and office images recommended
